appleskin.configuration.maxHudOverlayFla: Max alpha of flashing HUD icons
Alpha value of the flashing icons at their most visible point (1.0 = fully opaque, 0.0 = fully transparent)
appleskin.configuration.showFoodExhausti: If true, shows your food exhaustion as a progress bar behind the hunger bar
appleskin.configuration.showFoodHealthHu: If true, shows estimated health restored by food on the health bar
appleskin.configuration.showFoodStatsInD: Show food values in Debug Screen
If true, shows your hunger, saturation, and exhaustion level in Debug Screen
appleskin.configuration.showFoodValuesHu: Show hunger restored from held food
If true, shows the hunger (and saturation if showSaturationHudOverlay is true) that would be restored by food you are currently holding
Show overlays for food in off-hand
If true, enables the hunger/saturation/health overlays for food in your off-hand
appleskin.configuration.showFoodValuesIn: If true, shows the hunger and saturation values of food in its tooltip while holding SHIFT
Always show food values in tooltip
If true, shows the hunger and saturation values of food in its tooltip automatically (without needing to hold SHIFT)
appleskin.configuration.showSaturationHu: If true, shows your current saturation level overlayed on the hunger bar
appleskin.configuration.showVanillaAnima: Animate HUD icons to match Minecraft
If true, health/hunger overlay will shake to match Minecraft's icon animations
